thread.section_title: Sheenco Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Sheenco Travel | sheencotravel.com
thread.title: Bob Burnside
thread.title_full: Sheenco Travel reviewed by Bob Burnside

author: Bob Burnside
title: Bob Burnside
text:
If I had to name a remaining item on my bucket list it would be to once more tour Ireland with the folks at Sheenco. My wife and I so enjoyed our castle tour with them that it needs repeating, especially now that we know where we would spend more time. These people gain an understanding of what you are wanting . The vacation is set up for you , they do not squeeze you into a package that they happen to be selling as some agencies are prone to do.
It makes a difference . They love the country, there is lots to love, and they want you to as well. I recommend them highly
Bob Burnside
